base_description: Square, gray light switch plate with toggle.
part_description: Includes a central toggle switch, two screw holes, and a square plate. The toggle is centered, with screw holes symmetrically placed on either side.
internal_interaction_description: The toggle switch pivots within the plate, allowing it to move up and down. The screws secure the plate to the wall, ensuring stability and alignment of the switch mechanism.
external_interaction_description: The switch interacts with electrical wiring behind the plate to control lighting. Users manually flip the toggle up or down to turn lights on or off, impacting room illumination.
